elements.description:
### Usage Cards can be used directly in a page or application as shown below. Content included in a block with class `actions` will be rendered in the top right corner of the card header. ```

This is the main content area of a Predix card.

 ``` Alternatively, you could create your own Polymer components that instantiate different styles of cards, and use them in combination with the Predix Views service and the px-deck / px-dashboard sub-components of this repo. **Be sure to use the dropdown at the top of this screen to view details about the px-card behavior, as well as the px-deck and px-dashboard subcomponents.** ### Styling The following custom properties are available for styling: Custom property | Description ----------------|------------- `--px-card-background-color` | Background color of the card `--px-card-border-color` | Border color for the top of the card `--px-card-header-color` | Color of the header text `--px-card-icon-color` | Color of the card's main icon' `--px-card-action-icon-color` | Color of icons in actions slot `--px-card-action-icon-color--hover` | Color of icons in actions slot when hovered `--px-card-action-icon-color--pressed` | Color of icons in actions slot when pressed

properties.name: headerText
properties.description:
Text to be displayed in the header of the card.
Note: if you do not specify a value for this property,
the entire header area (including icon and actions slot)
will not be shown. Pass a blank space (e.g. ' ')
if you need the icon/actions but not the title.

properties.name: icon
properties.description:
Icon that appears to the left of the card header text.
Should be a valid icon name from the Predix icon set.

properties.name: fullBleed
properties.description:
When set to true, the contents of the card will stretch
from edge-to-edge, with no padding on the sides. Should only
be used for displaying graphics like images or maps within a card.

attributes.name: header-text
attributes.description:
Text to be displayed in the header of the card.
Note: if you do not specify a value for this property,
the entire header area (including icon and actions slot)
will not be shown. Pass a blank space (e.g. ' ')
if you need the icon/actions but not the title.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description:
Icon that appears to the left of the card header text.
Should be a valid icon name from the Predix icon set.

When set to true, the contents of the card will stretch
